UADataType.Description: Byte with Non safety Flags from SafetyConsumer

Field.Name: CommunicationError
Field.Description: 0: No error, 1: An error was detected in the previous ResponseSPDU.

Field.Name: OperatorAckRequested
Field.Description: Used to inform the SafetyProvider that operator acknowledgment is requested.

Field.Name: FSV_Activated
Field.Description: Is used for conformance test of SafetyConsumer.SAPI.FSV_Activated.

UADataType.Description: Byte with Safety Flags from SafetyProvider

Field.Name: OperatorAckProvider
Field.Description: Operator acknowledgment at the provider, hereby forwarded to the SafetyConsumer.

Field.Name: ActivateFSV
Field.Description: Activation of fail-safe values by the safety application at the SafetyProvider, hereby forwarded to the SafetyConsumer.

Field.Name: TestModeActivated
Field.Description: Enabling and disabling of test mode in the SafetyProvider, hereby forwarded to the SafetyConsumer.

UADataType.Description: Dummy structure to be used when no non-safety data are used

Field.Name: Dummy
Field.Description: Dummy variable to avoid empty structures

UAObjectType.Description: Base type of all safety objects

uax:Description.uax:Text: Byte with non-safety flags from SafetyConsumer
Byte with safety flags from SafetyProvider
Byte with non-safety flags from SafetyConsumer
Byte with safety flags from SafetyProvider

UAVariable.Description: Base-ID of the SafetyProvider as configured via the SPI
SafetyProviderDelay is the maximum time at the SafetyProvider from receiving the RequestSPDU to start the transmission of ResponseSPDU
Provider-ID of the SafetyProvider as configured via the SPI
The maximal SIL the SafetyProvider implementation (hardware & software) is capable of
Identifier of the structure type
Version of the algorithm for calculating the StructureSignature

UAObject.Description: Contains all instances of safety objects (SafetyProvider or SafetyConsumer)
Provides the metadata for a namespace used by the server.

UAVariable.Description: If TRUE then the server only supports a subset of the namespace.
The publication date for the namespace.
The URI of the namespace.
The human readable string representing version of the namespace.
A list of IdTypes for nodes which are the same in every server that exposes them.
A list of ranges for numeric node ids which are the same in every server that exposes them.
A regular expression which matches string node ids are the same in every server that exposes them.
Currently active Base-ID of the SafetyProvider
Currently active Provider-ID of the SafetyProvider
Indicates whether the SafetyProvider supports OPC UA Client/Server communication
Indicates whether the SafetyProvider supports OPC UA PubSub communication
Indicates whether the SafetyClient supports OPC UA Client/Server communication
Indicates whether the SafetyConsumer supports OPC UA PubSub communication

The maximal SIL the SafetyProvider implementation (hardware & software) is capable of
